summary: UBS is a huge Swiss bank that works worldwide. It helps rich people manage their money and keeps their secrets safe. UBS is one of the biggest and most important banks globally, with lots of money and customers, including many billionaires. It has been in trouble with some countries for helping people avoid paying taxes. UBS also uses new technology to keep its customers' information safe. Recently, it took over another big Swiss bank, Credit Suisse.
title: UBS
